file_insights.primary_content: Comprehensive TikTok review script framework with detailed templates
notable_features: Multiple script options for each beat
6-beat structure (Hook, Context, Pros, Cons, Verdict, CTA)
Specific delivery tips for each section
3 complete example scripts with different approaches
file_insights.technical_structure: Markdown with tables, code blocks, and hierarchical organization

file_insights.primary_content: TikTok story-driven content framework with narrative structures
file_insights.technical_structure: Markdown with narrative examples and timing guides

patterns_discovered.description: Both frameworks use repeatable beat-by-beat structures with timing breakdowns, allowing creators to swap components while maintaining narrative flow
Templates provided in multiple durations (45s, 55s, 60s, 70s) to serve different content strategies and platform requirements
Each framework explicitly identifies psychological mechanisms (trust building, risk reduction, social proof) that make content conversion-effective
Rather than generic guidance, templates provide 3-4 concrete script options for each beat with specific numbers and examples
Every script section includes 'Visual' guidance alongside dialogue, treating video production as integral to the framework
Review framework includes explicit guidance for comparison reviews and differentiation strategies

gotchas_discovered.description: The framework acknowledges that honest cons actually build trust more effectively than all-positive reviews, requiring deliberate inclusion of critical assessment
Templates must address multiple buyer personas (casual vs. serious, budget-conscious vs. value-focused) within 45-75 seconds without losing coherence
Wishy-washy recommendations damage credibility; frameworks emphasize definitive positioning with 'if/then' structures to maintain recommendation clarity
Short-form video success depends on matching visual cuts to narrative beats; static talking heads during detailed explanations underperform
Niche product reviews require domain knowledge demonstration while remaining accessible to category newcomers
Naming competing products creates risk of those viewers feeling dismissed if their choice is criticized; frameworks address with respectful comparative language

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created two comprehensive TikTok content frameworks (story-driven and review-based) that provide creators with modular, timing-optimized script templates with integrated psychological triggers and visual production guidance
completion_metrics: Two complete framework files created with substantial content (675+ lines for review framework)
Multiple script template variations provided (45s, 55s, 60s, 70s formats)
3-4 concrete example scripts per framework demonstrating real application
Beat-by-beat structure with delivery tips for each section
Visual guidance integrated with dialogue scripts
deliverables: Review Framework: 6-beat structure (Hook, Context, Pros, Cons, Verdict, CTA) with psychological underpinnings
Story Driven Framework: Narrative arc templates with emotional triggers and timing breakdowns
Multiple duration variants allowing format flexibility
Real example scripts showing framework application across different review types

recommendations.recommendation: Add A/B testing framework showing which hook styles, con presentation methods, and CTA approaches drive highest engagement metrics for different product categories
Create companion quick-reference cards (1-page PDFs) extracting the timing breakdowns and key delivery tips for rapid on-set reference during filming
Develop framework variants for sister platforms (Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts) with platform-specific visual pacing and CTA optimization
Include analytics monitoring checklist identifying which metrics (saves vs. comments vs. shares) indicate framework effectiveness for different review types
Add beginner variant simplifying the 6-beat structure to 3-beat core (verdict-context-recommendation) for creators uncomfortable with complex narratives
Plan integration testing with actual TikTok creators using frameworks to collect real-world performance data and refine templates based on conversion outcomes
